basics.name: Krish Joshi
basics.label: Principal Engineer & Cloud Architect
basics.headline: Engineering systems that scale effortlessly
basics.tagline: Specializing in Cloud-Native Architectures, AI Integration, and Distributed Systems.
basics.summary: Principal engineer with 14+ years of hands-on experience building digital products at scale, from early-stage startups to FTSE 100 enterprises. My career has evolved from full-stack .NET development through to frontend architecture and cloud platform leadership, with deep expertise across the entire software delivery lifecycle. I specialise in React, React Native, and AWS, and have architected systems serving millions of daily users at companies like Tesco, Chase UK, and Cisco. Recently, I've been at the forefront of integrating AI-assisted development tools—including Claude and Amazon Bedrock—into engineering workflows, dramatically accelerating delivery while maintaining enterprise-grade quality and security standards.

philosophy.statement: I build hardened infrastructure that behaves like living tissue—auto-scaling, self-healing, and observable at every layer.

work.name: CaspianOne Open Banking
work.summary: Brought in to optimise a FAPI-compliant Open Banking platform expanding into the Canadian market — focusing on performance, observability, and regulatory compliance across distributed serverless services.
highlights: Reduced **AWS Lambda cold starts by 40%** through dependency optimization and provisioned concurrency strategies, cutting infrastructure costs significantly.
Implemented end-to-end **OpenTelemetry instrumentation** across 12 microservices, enabling distributed tracing and reducing mean-time-to-diagnosis by 60%.
Architected **FAPI 2.0 compliant** authentication flows, ensuring PSD2 and Canadian Open Banking regulatory adherence while improving OAuth/OIDC response times.
work.stack: TypeScript, AWS Lambda, DynamoDB, API Gateway, OpenTelemetry, Terraform, GitHub Actions

work.name: Climatise
work.summary: Founding engineer at a sustainability AI startup — designed and built the entire cloud infrastructure and frontend platform from zero, enabling businesses to track and reduce carbon emissions using machine learning.
highlights: Architected a platform that **passed Amazon's Well-Architected Review** on first submission, leveraging SageMaker and Claude (Bedrock) for carbon emission analysis.
Built and recruited a **cross-functional engineering team** of 6, establishing coding standards, CI/CD pipelines, and agile delivery practices.
Owned full **Terraform IaC** across dev/staging/prod, managing Cognito, AppSync, Aurora, Lambda, and S3 with zero-downtime deployments.
Integrated **Amazon Bedrock (Claude)** for intelligent carbon recommendations, reducing manual analysis time by 80%.
work.stack: React, Next.js, TypeScript, Terraform, AWS Cognito, AWS AppSync, DynamoDB, Aurora, Tailwind CSS, GraphQL

work.name: Tesco
work.summary: Part of the platform team migrating Tesco's account ecosystem from a legacy monolith to cloud-native microservices — serving 2M+ daily users across login, registration, and account management.
highlights: Led migration of account pages to **Kubernetes-hosted microservices**, enabling horizontal scaling and reducing deployment time from hours to minutes.
Implemented **WebAuthn (Passkeys)** and OAuth2 flows, reducing account compromise incidents by 60% and improving login conversion rates.
Delivered SSR React applications with **90%+ test coverage** and sub-200ms page loads, using Playwright for E2E testing.
Transformed release process from **weekly to daily deployments** through Azure DevOps pipeline optimization and feature flagging.
work.stack: React (SSR, Redux, TypeScript, Formik, Storybook), Next.js, Node.js, Express, Playwright, Kubernetes, Azure Pipelines, Snyk

work.name: Chase UK (10x Future Tech)
work.summary: Collaborated with Chase Bank to launch their UK digital banking platform — building the 'Banking as a Platform' ecosystem enabling rapid assembly of modular banking products.
highlights: Delivered **unified web and mobile experiences** using React, React Native, and Next.js — ensuring feature parity across platforms.
Integrated **Apigee and OAuth** for secure API management, meeting FCA regulatory requirements and Chase's internal security standards.
Built **serverless orchestration** using AWS Lambda and Step Functions to streamline long-running operations like account onboarding.
Created reusable component library with **Material UI and Storybook**, adopted by 4 other product teams.
work.stack: React (Redux, TypeScript, Formik, Storybook), React Native, Next.js, Node.js, Express, Cypress, AWS Lambda, Step Functions, Jenkins

Ensured **DDA and GDPR compliance** across the platform while developing React Native mobile interfaces for field engineers.
